channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Overgrown shrubbery and weeds, 3rd October
item.description:
Area of shrubbery and weeds over growing pathway and invading up our fence and into our garden at 6 Deer Park Road, Hucclecote. This is an ongoing problem, 20+ years.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Deer Park Road, Hucclecote, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dead tree on Sochi Mews, 3rd October
item.description:
Only one of the six trees on Sochi Mews is still alive. And please can you let the Tree officer at the county council know so that they can put some more in the 22/23 planting season.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 12, Laxton Road, St Mark's, Cheltenham

item.title: Gas Cylinder Left Behind when previous tip cleared up, 2nd October
item.description:
The location is the entrance to the Old Quarry off Cleeve Common Road. A previous tip in the location last week was cleared up but the gas cylinder which had been in the fire there has been left. Please can it be cleared up before it attracts further tipping.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Noverton Lane, Southam, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Flytip at the Location, 2nd October
item.description:
The location is Mill Lane where the road goes over a stream. The flytip is assorted black bags together with what looks like a small refrigerator. Please can this be removed.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Mill Lane, Charlton Kings, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large amount of flytipping in alleyway to Rydal Walk, 30th September
item.description:
